channel.title: PISTOL - Play By Your Own Rules WIP [Dnb]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/pistol69/play-by-your-own-rules-wip
Something I’m working on at the moment which is kind of a half time dnb tune, fairly stripped back with a deep bassline.
I tried to make a track that doesn’t conform to the generic kick snare pattern of dnb, hence the title of the tune.
Let me know what you guys think, all feedback is welcome.
